title: Where it all started!
text: It was the first time you had called me over for lunch and won my heart at the exact second I tasted it.

title: Midnight Laughs
text: We laughed until 6am that night and didnt know the time changed on the same day. That makes it not 6 but 7 hours of nonstop gossips and getting to know each other that too when a whole human was sleeping beside us, whose notifs for someone reason was incredibly loud.

title: Dance vibes matched
text: Even though we didn't know how good we were at dancing we still vibed on the same songs with my good enough steps and your smooth but energetic dance moves. I'd say we make quite a good dance couple.üï∫üíÉ

title: Unofficial date? Huh?
text: I still can't believe we managed to go on a date without knowing we were going on a date. The fact that you posted me on your story just make some people jealous was just ljkbasfjkn hehe!

title: My first flower to you
text: She loves tulips, not roses yet she accepted mine with the softest smile. In that moment, I knew you didn't about perfection, but about the heart that offers it. Also, do you remember the small act I performed in that 24hr shop that goes like - Excuse me, here's a flower for youüòÅüåπ- hahahaha

title: Our first Hot Chocolate ever
text: It was sweet, warm, and a little shy. Just like the beginning of us. It felt really special sharing one cup with two straws.

title: Definitely a memorable night walk!
text: I remember, while wandering our way to the bolyai 24hr shop, we snapped a few photos but this one really stood out. Looks just like a scene straight out of a romantic film.

title: Miles apart, but always in my heart - chatgpt
text: First off, Sorry I stole that off chatgpt but it was kinda finny but romantic. I am really glad we went through this phase because it really brought us closer together and made bond even stronger. But still long-distance sucks. I really miss hugging and kissing you at random times of the day babuu..ü•≤üò≠

title: There's always a first time for trying gooie stuff..
text: You changed me, got me into skin care and made me try that?!. What the hell was that mixture even. Not gonna lie, it was lowkey couple goals. In the end both looked chikne with glowing skin. Honorable mention: The sooji halwa after that. Aaye Haaye!.

title: Made my way to your heart
